messages.subject: Aware Parenting e-group
messages.msgSnippet: Hi Sonia and all, I am the one who was posting Aletha Solter articles. I have read all three of her books, The Aware Baby , Helping Young Children Flourish
messages.messageBody:
Hi Sonia and all,

I am the one who was posting Aletha Solter articles. I have read all three
of her books, "The Aware Baby", "Helping Young Children Flourish" and "Tears
and Tantrums". I would highly recommend all three. If you are interested in
talking to parents who use Aletha Solter's approach to parenting
specifically, there is an aware-parenting e-group and here is the link:

awareparenting@egroups.com


One key aspect of Aware parenting is developing a deep understanding of how
our own upbringing affects our relationships with our children as well as
with everyone else.

If you have any specific questions, feel free to contact me.

There are also a lot of good links at Aletha Solter's web site
www.awareparenting.com

Nicoletta
